title: Authors and Citation
text: Bruce (2024). northstar: Revenue Integrity Tools. R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://github.com/andrewallenbruce/northstar, https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/northstar/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {northstar: Revenue Integrity Tools},   author = {Andrew Bruce},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://github.com/andrewallenbruce/northstar},   url = {https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/northstar/}, }

title: Revenue Integrity Tools
text: can install development version northstar GitHub :

title: Revenue Integrity Tools
code: library(northstar) library(dplyr) rvu() |>    filter(status   == "A",          work.rvu == max(work.rvu, na.rm = TRUE)) |>    select(hcpcs,           description,          work.rvu,           pe.rvu_nonfac,           pe.rvu_fac,           mp.rvu,           cf) |>   glimpse() > Rows: 1 > Columns: 7 > $ hcpcs         <chr> "39503" > $ description   <chr> "Repair of diaphragm hernia" > $ work.rvu      <dbl> 108.91 > $ pe.rvu_nonfac <dbl> 35.14 > $ pe.rvu_fac    <dbl> 35.14 > $ mp.rvu        <dbl> 26.95 > $ cf            <dbl> 32.7442 gpci() |>    filter(state    == "GA",           locality == "01") |>   glimpse() > Rows: 1 > Columns: 7 > $ mac           <chr> "10212" > $ state         <fct> GA > $ locality      <chr> "01" > $ locality_name <chr> "ATLANTA" > $ gpci.pw_floor <dbl> 1 > $ gpci.pe       <dbl> 0.997 > $ gpci.mp       <dbl> 1.128 calc_amounts(wrvu  = 108.91,              prvu  = 35.14,              mrvu  = 26.95,              wgpci = 1.0,              pgpci = 0.997,              mgpci = 1.128,              cf    = 32.7442) > Participating Amount:    $5,708.76 > Non-Particpating Amount: $6,236.82 > Limiting Charge:         $6,236.82 payment() |>    filter(hcpcs      == "39503",           carrier_no == "10212",          locality   == "01") |>    select(hcpcs,          mac = carrier_no,          locality,          fee_nonfac,          fee_fac) |>    glimpse() > Rows: 1 > Columns: 5 > $ hcpcs      <chr> "39503" > $ mac        <chr> "10212" > $ locality   <chr> "01" > $ fee_nonfac <dbl> 5708.76 > $ fee_fac    <dbl> 5708.76

what: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calc_amounts
title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calc_amounts
text: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calc_amounts
code: calc_amounts(wrvu, prvu, mrvu, wgpci, pgpci, mgpci, cf)

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calc_amounts
text: wrvu numeric prvu numeric mrvu numeric wgpci numeric pgpci numeric mgpci numeric cf numeric

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calc_amounts
Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calc_amounts
code: calc_amounts(wrvu  = 108.91,              prvu  = 35.14,              mrvu  = 26.95,              wgpci = 1.0,              pgpci = 0.997,              mgpci = 1.128,              cf    = 32.7442) #> Participating Amount:    $5,708.76 #> Non-Particpating Amount: $6,236.82 #> Limiting Charge:         $6,236.82
